EmailTemplate.subject: New survey shows how leading employers are putting health within reach of all employees
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
2023 Virtual Care Transformation Index Our workplaces look and operate much differently than they did just a few years ago. How will you plan for whatever comes next?
We recently asked more than 300 HR decision makers, at companies with 2,500+ employees, about how they are improving the healthcare experience and putting health within reach of their entire workforce <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/report/2023-virtual-care-transformation-index-5-ways-employers-are-putting-health-within-reach/?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=employer&utm_term=in-text-cta&utm_campaign=OTH-202309-EMP-HCT-VIRTUAL-TRANSFORMATION-EBOOK&utm_campaign_id=VCT1]]>.
- The #1 reason employers invest in virtual primary care services is to improve the employee healthcare experience - 80% of employers said they would will focus expansion of mental health services for adolescents over the next three years - 95% of employers agree that whole-person care can help build a better benefits package About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
